spec.description: A dashboard to visualize application's deployment.

panels.description: CPU usage greater than 40% and  less than 75%
panels.title: Ideal Usage

panels.description: memory usage greater than 40% and less than 75%
panels.title: Ideal Usage

panels.description: Show services  where request success rate is below 90%.
panels.title: < 90 Success Rate

panels.description:
Shows services where success rate is between 90% and 99.99%.

panels.title: > 90 and < 99.99 Success Rate

panels.description: Shows services  with 100% request success rate
panels.title: 100% Success Rate

panels.description: Shows services handling 1â€“10 requests per second

targets.expr:
sum by(service_name) (
  rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name=~".*", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[1m])
) > 0
and
sum by(service_name) (
  rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name=~".*", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[1m])
) <= 10

panels.title: Inactive

panels.description: Shows services handling 11 to 6000 requests per second.

targets.expr:
sum by(service_name) (
  rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name=~".*", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[1m])
) > 10
and
sum by(service_name) (
  rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name=~".*", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[1m])
) <= 6000

panels.title: Moderately Active

panels.description: Shows services handling 6001 to 60,000 requests per second.

targets.expr:
sum by(service_name) (
  rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name=~".*", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[1m])
) > 6000
and
sum by(service_name) (
  rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name=~".*", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[1m])
) <= 60000

panels.title: Active
